title: Sleeping Dogs Lie
description: A jealous wife kidnaps her cheating husband and his young secretary and holds them hostage in an isolated house in the desert; but divorce is the furthest thing from her mind.

title: Whose Streets?
description: Whose Streets? is an unflinching look at how the killing of 18-year-old Mike Brown inspired a community to fight back and sparked a global movement.

title: The Art of Attack and Defence
The Son of Joseph
description: A discontented Parisian teenager in search of a father with (Mathieu Amalric) and (Fabrizio Rongione) as his, respectively, callous and gentle alternative paternal options, and (Natacha Régnier) as his single mother.

title: An Inconvenient Sequel: Truth to Power
description: A decade after An Inconvenient Truth (2006) brought climate change into the heart of popular culture comes the follow-up that shows just how close we are to a real energy revolution.

title: Dragons Forever
description: A fishery is taking a questionable chemical company to court for their water polution. The company then hires lawyer Jackie Lung, arms dealer Wong, crackpot inventor and professional criminal Tung to try to woo and convince the fishery owner to cancel the court. But eventually, the trio discover the truth of the chemical company-a drugs den and then decide to fight for the right.

title: Armour Of God Ii: Operation Condor
description: Hong Kong treasure hunter Jackie, a.k.a. "Asian Condor" is hired to track down buried Nazi gold in WWII in the Sahara Desert, teaming up with other 3 women. However a team of mercenries have ideas on the ownership of the gold. A battle / chase ensues as to who gets there first. Lots of choregraphed Kung-Fu and quirky Chan humour.

title: Armour Of God
description: Jackie, a.k.a. "Asian Hawk", is a former musician who becomes an adventurer and treasure hunter. He and his outstanding sidekick are employed by an agency to go to Europe to find out a secretive fortune hidden by a group of shadowy monks.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
description: Kingsman: The Secret Service tells the story of an extremely secret agent organization which is in the process of recruiting a street kid who is uneducated but very promising in spy training extremely harsh program , in order to dealing with a global threat of an evil technology genius .

title: Kung Fu Panda
description: The story is set in a fictional land in ancient China where Po, a giant panda, is chosen as the Dragon Warrior to fight back the treacherous enemy who spreads chaos throughout the countryside. Despite his obese and clumsy look, he bears the mark of the chosen kungfu master.

title: Who Am I?
description: A secret agent (Jackie Chan) survives but loses his memory after a plane crash. Recognized by CIA agent Morgan, he knows covert operatives have used assassins to kill him, and the martial arts gets fancy while he is heading to Rotterdam in hopes of recovering his memory.

title: Twinkle, Twinkle, Lucky Stars
description: A police informant sent a letter with important information on an illegal drug operation to his friend, Yi-Ching. While in Thailand, the informant is killed by the drug dealer's henchmen and, to continue their business, they try to murder Yi-Ching and double-agent Lau. Back in Hong Kong, police detectives Muscles and Ricky Fung's duty is to protect Lau and Inspector Barbara Woo protects Yi-Ching. She takes her to the "Five Lucky Stars"'s place and help knock down the drug operation.

title: My Lucky Stars
description: A Hongkong action movie about undercover cop Muscles (Jackie Chan) enlists his childhood friends, the "Five Lucky Stars", to travel to Japan to help him catch a Yakuza group-an ex-cop who stole a large amount of money in diamonds. After one is caught by the Ninja-gang protecting the evil cop, the other one gets his old Orphanage gang, dubbed the "Five Lucky Stars," to help him. They don't like this much, but they do it.

title: Wheels On Meals
description: Thomas and David (Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao) own a mobile restaurant, tie up with Moby (Sammo Hung)- a clumsy detective to rescue Sylvia-a beautiful pickpocket that David encountered on the street. Following is a lot of actions and humor in the streets of Barcelona, ending up with a vicious fight in the hideout of the gangs.

title: The Young Master
description: Dragon (Jackie Chan) is kicked out of his kung-fu school because commits many crimes. He will only be re-admitted into the school if he can bring his brother to light. He is then mistaken for his brother and all the silly sequences happens which makes him have to bring the crime boss out to clear his name.

title: The Fearless Hyena 2
description: Hing Lung (Jackie Chan) is a young boy living in a small village with his grandfather who teaches him Kung-Fu but he is not allowed to perform their Kung-Fu to others. Jackie, though beats up some villains to act as the master of a Kung-Fu school which then gets well-known, as an old enemy of Jackie's grandfather shows up and attacks him. Jackie is then trained by another member of the old gang, until he can take revenge for his grandfather's murder.

title: Snake In The Eagles Shadow
description: Chien Fu (Jackie Chan) is a boy working as a janitor and gets abused by his teachers and fellow students without being able to fight back. One day he is taught a kungfu art called Snake's Fist by an unknown old beggar, since then he is not bullied anymore. He then mixes his current martial art with a technique that he watches how his cat kills a cobra to make into a new fighting style. Later, he uses this kungfu art to defeat The Eagle's Claw style of a man who threatens the old man who used to help him with Snake's Fist.

title: Snake & Crane Arts Of Shaolin
description: Hsu Ying Fung (Jackie Chan) is a young martial artist who is suspected of killing eight masters who wrote outstanding "Snake & Crane Arts of Shaolin" techniques and stealing the book. He is searching for the man who is responsible for his 8 masters' disappearance and fight off a number of other clans (who also want the book). He finally learns the fate of his masters and defeats the villain.

title: Enter The Dragon
description: Lee (Bruce Lee) a distinguished martial artist recruited by a British intelligence agency takes part in a fierce fight against mysterious drugs lord Han (Shih Kien) who is also responsible for Lee's sister's death. Together with Roper (John Saxon) and Williams (Jim Kelly) they discover the drug lair situated at an isolated island and defeats Han's gangs in a brutal battle.

title: Fist Of Fury
description: Fist Of Fury movie content: The film tells about Chen Zhen, played by Bruce Lee, is a disciple of Huo Yuanjia. When he hears his master had died, he immediately returns back with his master. When he discovers the plot after the mysterious death of Huo Yuanjia, Chen Zhen decides to investigate and arrest the perpetrator.

title: The Legend Of Drunken Master
description: In a train coming home, Wong Fei Hong accidentally picks the wrong luggage of Phuc which has a Chinese jade that the British ambassador secretly repatriated. This event makes Wong Fei Hong become the searching target of Phuc and British ambassadors.

title: Shaolin
description: The film is about warlord Hou Jie ,after ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited he turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation. Where will everything come to ?

title: Undisputed 3: Redemption
description: Eight elite fighters - prisoners from maximum security prisons around the world - are brought together by a powerful underground gambling syndicate for a secret, survival-of-the-fiercest battle competition. With the odds against him overwhelming, Boyka will take on the syndicate his way and send the whole scheme crashing down around them.

title: Undisputed 2: Last Man Standing
description: Chambers is detained in a prison in Russia, and he has to participate in violent boxing match. He can suviver or die, he faces tremendous and violence fighter . Does he passes over this difficulty.

title: Undisputed
description: Undisputed is the action film is about Monroe Hutchen- a heavyweight boxer. When heavyweight champion George 'Iceman' Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.

title: Kung Fu Panda 2
description: Po's life now is as beautiful as a dream, he serves as the fabled Dragon Warrior protecting his home with his heroes now his closest friends. However his life is threatened ,Po must learn about his past and find true inner peace against all opposition.

title: Kung Fu Hustle
description: Set in the social of China in the 1940s, gangs have enormous impact. They go to anywhere with terror. He stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords who turns out to be the greatest kung-fu masters in disguise. Sing's actions eventually cause the Axe Gang and the slumlords to engage in an explosive kung-fu battle. Only one side will win and only one hero will emerge as the greatest kung-fu master of all.

title: Ninja Assassin
description: Raizo and Kiriko are raised by The Ozunu, an organization which trains orphans to become ninja assassins. They have a romance, but when Kiriko asks Raizo to escape from The Ozunu's control with her, he refused. Being considered as a betrayals, Kiriko is caught and executed in front of Raizo, which makes Raizo begin to harbor resentment and doubt towards the Ozunu. He goes against the order of Lord Ozunu and fight against his fellow ninja kin. After that, he escapes and try to intervene Ozuno assassination attempts.
